body_content.explanation: the activity of sending and receiving radio messages as a hobby:
examples: He took an interest in broadcasting at the age of 12, when a friend introduced him to ham radio.
After 10 days, their SOS appeal was heard by a farmer listening on ham radio.

body_content.explanation: a radio that is built and used by someone whose hobby is sending and receiving radio messages:
examples: The antenna on the back of the truck is for a ham radio.
My dad was a ham radio operator, so there were always electronic parts lying around.
